workflow.name: CrunchBase competitor intelligence tracker
workflow.description:
Automated system for monitoring and analyzing competitor activities, funding rounds, and market movements using CrunchBase data.

## üöÄ What It Does

- Tracks competitor funding rounds
- Monitors leadership changes
- Analyzes investment patterns
- Identifies new market entries
- Tracks product launches

## üéØ Perfect For

- Startup founders
- Business strategists
- Market analysts
- Investment professionals
- Corporate development

## ‚öôÔ∏è Key Benefits

‚úÖ Competitive intelligence  
‚úÖ Early warning system  
‚úÖ Market trend analysis  
‚úÖ Strategic insights  
‚úÖ Time-saving automation  

## üîß What You Need

- CrunchBase API access
- n8n instance
- Google Sheets (for data storage)
- Notification preferences

## üìä Tracking Metrics

- Funding amounts and rounds
- Investor networks
- Hiring trends
- Market expansion
- Product updates

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup & Support

### Quick Setup

Start tracking in 20 minutes with our step-by-step guide

### üì∫ Watch Tutorial

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/badge/YouTube-Watch_Tutorial-red?style=for-the-badge&logo=youtube)](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)

### üíº Get Expert Support

[![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-Connect-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=linkedin)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)

### üìß Direct Help

[![Email](https://img.shields.io/badge/Email-Contact%20Us-green?style=for-the-badge&logo=gmail)](mailto:Yaron@nofluff.online)

Gain a competitive edge with automated tracking and analysis of your competitors' activities and strategies.

parameters.name: Review Crunchbase Update and inform your manager

parameters.content:
## üîπ **SECTION 1: Input & Preparation üîß‚úèÔ∏èüß†**

### üß© Nodes Included:

1. üîò **Manual Trigger**
2. üìù **Set Competitor Name**
3. üß† **Generate Crunchbase Slug**

---

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ üîò **Manual Trigger** ‚Äî `Manual Trigger`

üöÄ **What it does:**
This node allows you to **manually run the workflow** during testing or setup. It doesn't trigger automatically on a schedule, but gives you control to click and run whenever you want.

üß∞ **Why it's useful:**
Perfect for **debugging** and **testing**. Instead of waiting for a scheduled run, you can instantly see what the workflow does.

---

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ üìù **Set Competitor Name** ‚Äî `Set Competitor Name`

üõ† **What it does:**
This node manually defines the company (competitor) you're tracking on Crunchbase.

üî° **Example input:**

```json
{
  "Competitor": "Stripe, Inc."
}
```

üí° **Why it's useful:**
Allows you to customize which competitor to check ‚Äî one at a time ‚Äî while testing. Later, you could replace this with a list from a database or Google Sheet for full automation.

---

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ üß† **Generate Crunchbase Slug** ‚Äî `Generate Crunchbase Slug`

üîÑ **What it does:**
Converts the raw company name into a **Crunchbase-friendly slug** (like a web-safe name) used in the Crunchbase API call.

üî° **Example:**

* `"Stripe, Inc."` ‚Üí `"stripe-inc"`

üß† **How it works:**

* Lowercases the text
* Removes punctuation
* Replaces spaces with hyphens (`-`)

üìå **Why it's important:**
Crunchbase‚Äôs API requires company slugs in the URL, not full names. This function ensures you get the correct format every time.

---

### ‚úÖ **End of Section 1:**

You now have a properly formatted `slug` for a company like `openai` or `stripe-inc`, ready to query Crunchbase for real-time data.

---

## üîπ **SECTION 2: Fetch + Create Task üì°üóÇ**

### üß© Nodes Included:

4. üåê **Fetch Crunchbase Data**
5. üìã **Create Review Task in ClickUp**

---

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ üåê **Fetch Crunchbase Data** ‚Äî `Fetch Crunchbase Data`

üîç **What it does:**
Makes a real-time API call to **Crunchbase** using the generated `slug`, and pulls in key information about the company ‚Äî like funding, description, homepage, and last updated date.

üîë **Requires:** Crunchbase API Key

üî° **Example API Call:**

```http
GET https://api.crunchbase.com/api/v4/entities/organizations/stripe-inc?user_key=YOUR_API_KEY
```

üßæ **Sample Data Retrieved:**

* `name`: Stripe
* `updated_at`: 2025-06-05T12:34:56Z
* `total_funding_usd`: 10B+
* `homepage_url`: [https://stripe.com](https://stripe.com)
* `short_description`: Online payment infrastructure

üìå **Why it's useful:**
This gives you all the relevant data about the competitor's recent activities that might be worth your team's attention.

---

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ üìã **Create Review Task in ClickUp** ‚Äî `Create Review Task in ClickUp`

üóÇ **What it does:**
Automatically creates a new **task in ClickUp**, assigning the Crunchbase update to your team for review.

üìÑ **Task Includes:**

* üè∑ Title: `Review Crunchbase Update: Stripe`
* üìù Description:

  ```text
  Company: Stripe
  Last Updated: 2025-06-05
  Description: Online payment infrastructure
  Total Funding: $10B
  Website: https://stripe.com
  ```

üí° **Why it's powerful:**
No manual tracking or checking needed ‚Äî your team is alerted **automatically** when there‚Äôs something new. It ensures nothing slips through the cracks.

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

‚ú® **Crunchbase ‚Üí ClickUp Automation**

Track competitor updates from **Crunchbase** and automatically create **ClickUp tasks** for your team to review ‚Äî all in just a few clicks!

---

## üîπ **SECTION 1: Input & Preparation üîß‚úèÔ∏èüß†**

### üß© Nodes Included:

1. üîò **Manual Trigger**
2. üìù **Set Competitor Name**
3. üß† **Generate Crunchbase Slug**

---

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ üîò **Manual Trigger** ‚Äî `Manual Trigger`

---

### ‚úÖ **End of Section 1:**

You now have a properly formatted `slug` for a company like `openai` or `stripe-inc`, ready to query Crunchbase for real-time data.

---

## üîπ **SECTION 2: Fetch + Create Task üì°üóÇ**

### üß© Nodes Included:

4. üåê **Fetch Crunchbase Data**
5. üìã **Create Review Task in ClickUp**

---

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ üåê **Fetch Crunchbase Data** ‚Äî `Fetch Crunchbase Data`

üîç **What it does:**
Makes a real-time API call to **Crunchbase** using the generated `slug`, and pulls in key information about the company ‚Äî like funding, description, homepage, and last updated date.

üîë **Requires:** Crunchbase API Key

üî° **Example API Call:**

```http
GET https://api.crunchbase.com/api/v4/entities/organizations/stripe-inc?user_key=YOUR_API_KEY
```

üßæ **Sample Data Retrieved:**

* `name`: Stripe
* `updated_at`: 2025-06-05T12:34:56Z
* `total_funding_usd`: 10B+
* `homepage_url`: [https://stripe.com](https://stripe.com)
* `short_description`: Online payment infrastructure

üìå **Why it's useful:**
This gives you all the relevant data about the competitor's recent activities that might be worth your team's attention.

---

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ üìã **Create Review Task in ClickUp** ‚Äî `Create Review Task in ClickUp`

üóÇ **What it does:**
Automatically creates a new **task in ClickUp**, assigning the Crunchbase update to your team for review.

üìÑ **Task Includes:**

* üè∑ Title: `Review Crunchbase Update: Stripe`
* üìù Description:

  ```text
  Company: Stripe
  Last Updated: 2025-06-05
  Description: Online payment infrastructure
  Total Funding: $10B
  Website: https://stripe.com
  ```

üí° **Why it's powerful:**
No manual tracking or checking needed ‚Äî your team is alerted **automatically** when there‚Äôs something new. It ensures nothing slips through the cracks.

---

## üéØ **Final Outcome**

You now have a streamlined mini-intelligence system:

* ‚úÖ Input a company
* üîÅ Convert it into a slug
* üì° Fetch live data
* üìù Create an action task for your team

All **automated**, all **within n8n** ‚Äî no coding required beyond smart node usage. ‚ú®

---
